tool_description: Search thousands of cocktail recipes. This API allows users to find cocktail recipes based on the name or ingredients provided.

api_list.name: /v1/cocktail
api_list.description: API Ninjas Cocktail API endpoint. Either 'name' or 'ingredients' parameter must be set to retrieve cocktail recipes.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the cocktail. This parameter supports partial matches (e.g., 'bloody' will match 'bloody mary' and 'bloody margarita').

optional_parameters.name: ingredients
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated string of ingredients to search. Only cocktails containing all listed ingredients will be returned. For example, to search cocktails containing Vodka and lemon juice, use 'vodka,lemon juice'.
